title: Max Fala
text:
Max Fala is a Samoan <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Saoma</a> at the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>.
Playing career.
A <a href="Northcote%20Tigers">Northcote Tigers</a> player in the <a href="Auckland%20Rugby%20League">Auckland Rugby League</a> competition, Fala was selected for the <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Samoa</a> side in 2000 for the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">World Cup</a>. He played in three matches for Samoa, coming off the bench.
